A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Basically taking the first 3 (A New Hope\, The Empire Strikes Back\, Return of the Jedi) mixed in a blender then half poured in the trash and half mixed with a D level movie to make this. Recycled scenes without the actual story to flow as a single movie. Felt long and forced but nothing like you would hope/expect from a Star Wars movie. The original characters are tossed away with horrible newly created character flaws while the new ones still do not have any allure since there is no character - they have little to no substance.
